sentence: “Peter is truly an original thinker who you can bring your hardest problems and get unique suggestions.” Thiel likewise praised Zuckerberg for his “intelligence, energy, and conscientiousness.” “His talents will serve Meta well as he leads the company into a new era,” Thiel said Thiel is now reportedly expected to focus more of his time on conservative political causes, including senate bids by two of his proteges, Blake Masters and JD Vance, according to the WSJ report.
author: Theo Wayt
title: Peter Thiel leaving Meta board, will reportedly focus on pro-Trump advocacy

sentence: He recently donated $10m each to the Senate campaigns of Blake Masters, who is running for a seat in Arizona, and JD Vance, who is running in Ohio.
author: Johana Bhuiyan
title: Peter Thiel, PayPal founder and Trump ally, to step down from Meta board

sentence: Advertisement He reportedly plans to support Republicans in line with Mr Trump’s agenda, such as Blake Masters and JD Vance, in the 2022 midterm elections.
author: Giulia Bottaro
title: Trump-supporting tech billionaire quits Facebook to focus on politics
